column4: hello guys, i have a problem with ubuntu(latest stable) on my laptop, when i boot it up powernowd wasnt working, so i switched to powersave, unfortunaly at boot time only the governor performance gets loaded, but i want the govenor on demand
latest stable is not good enough a definition any more now that we have LTS - 6.06 or 6.10?
sry for that, i am using 6.10
